text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَهُونَ

translation.en: Indeed, for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, We have made pleasing to them their deeds, so they wander blindly
translation.id: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang tidak beriman kepada akhirat, Kami jadikan terasa indah bagi mereka (yang buruk), sehingga mereka bergelimang dalam kesesatan
